named-query.name: getDepartmentNameByPath
named-query.query: select d.name from Department d where d.path = :path

named-query.name: getDepartmentCountSumDate
named-query.query: select si.tag, count(si.id), sum(si.shouldSalary), sum(si.insuranceEmp), sum(si.insuranceCom), sum(si.accumulationFundEmp), sum(si.accumulationFundCom), sum(si.tax), sum(si.realitySalary) from SalaryInfo si, Department d where si.departmentPath = d.path group by si.tag

named-query.name: getSSCountByDepName
named-query.query: select dc.depName, sum(dc.shouldSalary) from DepartmentCount dc where dc.year = :currentYear group by dc.depName

named-query.name: getSSCountByNameAndYear
named-query.query: select dc.mounth, dc.shouldSalary from DepartmentCount dc where dc.depName = :name and dc.year = :currentYear
